snippet.title: Distortion Nation Playthrough
snippet.description:
Hi ya'll!

I really like the artstyle of this game. It's really dark colors and full colors with distinct and large shapes and it makes it very pleasing to look at and play. This game goes through a day in the life of a vampire who doesn't actually drink blood... that's the least of their problems though.

Love ya'll!

Distortion Nation: https://tangledvirus.itch.io/distortion-nation
